Ancient Melody.text: Target creature loses your age to all disiplines.
Ancient Melody.flavour: Time for Grandma to knock some sense into you

Luv.text:
When your significant other is in the room Luv
gains 10 energy and Outperform Courage :5/
The creature engaged with Luv gains Courage
based on the damage Luv's attacks would do.
If they reach 175 Courage or higher destroy
that creature.
When Luv becomes engaged,congradulate
her for getting married.

The Creature that played this attack passes all Speed
 Checks and Challenges on attacks it plays for rest of the game.

Improvised Water B@ll.text:
Reveal this card from you hand: If your engaged creature has
Water,shuffle this card and another copy of "Improvised 
Water B@ll" from outside the game into your Attack Deck
 and draw an Attack Card. Use this ability on cards named 
"Impovised Water B@ll"only once each turn.

Stand B@all.text:
Challenge Courage -5: Deal 10 damage.
Prop up your engaged Creature vertically, it gains "Defender"
until it falls down.*(Your opponent may not interfere with the
 card or table unless another card says otherwise)*

B@llink and You'll Miss It.text:
Challenge Speed -5: Deal 10 damage.
Have a staring contest with your opponent, if you win your
engaged Creature and all Battlegear equipped to it gain
"Untargetable by opponents".

Know-It-B@ll.text:
Challenge Wisdom -5: Deal 10 damage.
 Your opponent reads the name of a Chaotic card without a
 smiley set symbol. if you successfully recite the abilities of that
card, Look at the top 5 cards of either players Attack deck and
 put them back in any order.

B@ll In A Day's Work.text:
Challenge Power -5: Deal 10 damage.
Choose up to ohne Creature you control, it loses all abilities and
 cannot play mugic, move, or deal damage until the beginning of
 the 2nd tun after this card resolves. When this effect ends,
put a :TLCounter: on that Creature.

Fast B@ll.text:
Stat Check Speed 75: Deal 10 damage.
When this card resolves throw it outside the play area *(it is
removed from play).*

Foul B@ll.text:
Stat Check Wisdom 75: Deal 10 damage.
This card is face-up while in your Attack Deck. *(Both players may see where this card is in the deck)*

 players discard pile at random with a copy of Replicating B@lls
 from outside the game

Salt B@lls.text:
Deal 5 damage for each Chaotic game you've lost against your
 opponent since the last time you won against them.

Soot B@lls.text:
When an Attack Deck with this card is shuffled [including deck
setup], first shuffle the deck without this card, then shuffle this
 card into the bottom 5 cards of that deck,
Fire, Air,: Shuffle up to 2 Attack Cards from your
opponent's discard pile into their Attack Deck.

Sand B@lls.text:
When an Attack Deck with this card is shuffled [including deck
setup], first shuffle the deck without this card, then shuffle this
card into the bottom 5 cards of that deck.
Air, Earth: Search your Location deck for a card, Shuffle
 the deck, it becomes the new active Location.

Muck B@lls.text:
When an Attack with this card is shuffled [including deck
